pages.text: It happens again and again that you just quickly put down a box to store your belongings and as you come back find everything looted.$(br)To solve this issue you have developed this special chest, which can even help you to catch the thief in the act.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Heartbound Chest can only be opened by its placer and provides the same space as two normal chests.

pages.title: Redstone Component
pages.text: Similar to a Trapped Chest it also outputs a $(thing)redstone signal$().$(br)If you as the owner open it, the signal strength will be full, if a stranger wants to tamper with your belongings then only half.
